73 SparseMatrix::SparseMatrix()
74  : SparseMatrix(MPI_COMM_SELF)

83 SparseMatrix::SparseMatrix(MPI_Comm communicator)
84  : m_nRows(0), m_nCols(0), m_nNZ(0), m_maxRowNZ(0), m_lastRow(-1),
85  m_assembled(false),
86  m_partitioned(false),
87  m_global_nRows(0), m_global_nCols(0), m_global_nNZ(0),
88  m_global_maxRowNZ(0), m_global_rowOffset(0), m_global_colOffset(0)
89 {
90  // Set the communicator
91  setCommunicator(communicator);
92 }
93 #else
97 SparseMatrix::SparseMatrix()
98  : m_nRows(0), m_nCols(0), m_nNZ(0), m_maxRowNZ(0), m_lastRow(-1),
99  m_assembled(false)
100 {
101 }
102 #endif

136 SparseMatrix::SparseMatrix(MPI_Comm communicator, bool partitioned, long nRows, long nCols, long nNZ)
137  : SparseMatrix(communicator)
138 {
139  _initialize(partitioned, nRows, nCols, nNZ);
140 }

154  : SparseMatrix()

157 }

188  _initialize(partitioned, nRows, nCols, nNZ);

203 void SparseMatrix::initialize(long nRows, long nCols, long nNZ)
204 {
205 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
206  _initialize(false, nRows, nCols, nNZ);
207 #else
208  _initialize(nRows, nCols, nNZ);
209 #endif
210 }
211 
212 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
227 void SparseMatrix::_initialize(bool partitioned, long nRows, long nCols, long nNZ)
228 {
229  // Serial initialization
230  _initialize(nRows, nCols, nNZ);
231 
232  // Parallel initialization
233  m_partitioned = partitioned;
234 
235  m_global_nRows = m_nRows;
236  m_global_nCols = m_nCols;
237  if (m_partitioned) {
238  MPI_Allreduce(MPI_IN_PLACE, &m_global_nRows, 1, MPI_LONG, MPI_SUM, m_communicator);
239  MPI_Allreduce(MPI_IN_PLACE, &m_global_nCols, 1, MPI_LONG, MPI_SUM, m_communicator);
240  }
241 
242  m_global_rowOffset = 0;
243  m_global_colOffset = 0;
244  if (m_partitioned) {
245  int nProcessors;
246  MPI_Comm_size(m_communicator, &nProcessors);
247 
248  std::vector<long> nGlobalRows(nProcessors);
249  MPI_Allgather(&nRows, 1, MPI_LONG, nGlobalRows.data(), 1, MPI_LONG, m_communicator);
250 
251  std::vector<long> nGlobalCols(nProcessors);
252  MPI_Allgather(&nCols, 1, MPI_LONG, nGlobalCols.data(), 1, MPI_LONG, m_communicator);
253 
254  int rank;
255  MPI_Comm_rank(m_communicator, &rank);
256  for (int i = 0; i < rank; ++i) {
257  m_global_rowOffset += nGlobalRows[i];
258  m_global_colOffset += nGlobalCols[i];
259  }
260  }
261 }
262 #endif
263 
275 void SparseMatrix::_initialize(long nRows, long nCols, long nNZ)
276 {
277  assert(nRows >= 0);
278  assert(nCols >= 0);
279  assert(nNZ >= 0);
280 
281  clear();
282 
283  m_pattern.reserve(nRows, nNZ);
284  m_values.reserve(nNZ);
285 
286  m_nRows = nRows;
287  m_nCols = nCols;
288 }
289 
295 void SparseMatrix::clear(bool release)
296 {
297  if (release) {
298  m_pattern.clear();
299  m_values.clear();
300  } else {
301  FlatVector2D<long>().swap(m_pattern);
302  std::vector<double>().swap(m_values);
303  }
304 
305  m_nRows = 0;
306  m_nCols = 0;
307  m_nNZ = 0;
308  m_maxRowNZ = 0;
309  m_lastRow = -1;
310 
311 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
312  m_partitioned = false;
313 
314  m_global_nRows = 0;
315  m_global_nCols = 0;
316  m_global_nNZ = 0;
317  m_global_maxRowNZ = 0;
318  m_global_rowOffset = 0;
319  m_global_colOffset = 0;
320 #endif
321 
322  m_assembled = false;
323 }
324 
330 void SparseMatrix::squeeze()
331 {
332  m_pattern.shrinkToFit();
333  m_values.shrink_to_fit();
334 }
335 
346 void SparseMatrix::assembly()
347 {
348  // Early return if the matrix is already assembled.
349  if (isAssembled()) {
350  return;
351  }
352 
353  // Assembly can be called only after adding all the rows
354  if (countMissingRows() != 0) {
355  throw std::runtime_error("Assembly can be called only after adding all the rows.");
356  }
357 
358 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
359  // Updathe global information of the non-zero elements
360  if (m_partitioned) {
361  MPI_Allreduce(&m_maxRowNZ, &m_global_maxRowNZ, 1, MPI_LONG, MPI_MAX, m_communicator);
362  MPI_Allreduce(&m_nNZ, &m_global_nNZ, 1, MPI_LONG, MPI_SUM, m_communicator);
363  }
364 #endif
365 
366  // The function is now assembled
367  m_assembled = true;
368 }
369 
375 bool SparseMatrix::isAssembled() const
376 {
377  return m_assembled;
378 }
379 
385 long SparseMatrix::countMissingRows() const
386 {
387  long nRows = getRowCount();
388  long nAddedRows = countAddedRows();
389 
390  return (nRows - nAddedRows);
391 }
392 
398 long SparseMatrix::countAddedRows() const
399 {
400  return (m_lastRow + 1);
401 }
402

439 {
440  return m_pattern.getItemCount(row);
441 }

449 {
450  return m_maxRowNZ;

469 const MPI_Comm & SparseMatrix::getCommunicator() const
470 {
471  return m_communicator;
472 }
473 
480 void SparseMatrix::setCommunicator(MPI_Comm communicator)
481 {
482  if ((communicator != MPI_COMM_NULL) && (communicator != MPI_COMM_SELF)) {
483  MPI_Comm_dup(communicator, &m_communicator);
484  } else {
485  m_communicator = MPI_COMM_SELF;
486  }
487 }
488 
492 void SparseMatrix::freeCommunicator()
493 {
494  if (m_communicator != MPI_COMM_SELF) {
495  int finalizedCalled;
496  MPI_Finalized(&finalizedCalled);
497  if (!finalizedCalled) {
498  MPI_Comm_free(&m_communicator);
499  }
500  }
501 }

568 std::vector<long> SparseMatrix::extractLocalGlobalRows() const
569 {
570  const std::size_t *rowExtents = m_pattern.indices();
571 
572  std::vector<long> localGlobalRows;
573  localGlobalRows.reserve(m_nRows);
574  for (long i = 0; i < m_nRows; ++i) {
575  std::size_t nRowNZ = rowExtents[i + 1] - rowExtents[i];
576  if (nRowNZ > 0) {
577  localGlobalRows.push_back(m_global_rowOffset + i);
578  }
579  }
580 
581  return localGlobalRows;
582 }
583 
589 std::vector<long> SparseMatrix::extractGhostGlobalRows() const
590 {
591  return std::vector<long>();
592 }
593 
599 std::vector<long> SparseMatrix::extractLocalGlobalCols() const
600 {
601  long firstGlobalCol = m_global_colOffset;
602  long lastGlobalCol = m_global_colOffset + m_nCols - 1;
603 
604  const long *globalCols = m_pattern.data();
605 
606  std::vector<long> localGlobalCols;
607  localGlobalCols.reserve(m_nNZ);
608  for (long k = 0; k < m_nNZ; ++k) {
609  long globalCol = globalCols[k];
610  if (globalCol < firstGlobalCol || globalCol >= lastGlobalCol) {
611  utils::addToOrderedVector<long>(globalCol, localGlobalCols);
612  }
613  }
614 
615  return localGlobalCols;
616 }
617 
623 std::vector<long> SparseMatrix::extractGhostGlobalCols() const
624 {
625  long firstGlobalCol = m_global_colOffset;
626  long lastGlobalCol = m_global_colOffset + m_nCols - 1;
627 
628  const long *globalCols = m_pattern.data();
629 
630  std::vector<long> ghostGlobalCols;
631  if (m_nNZ > 0) {
632  ghostGlobalCols.reserve(m_nNZ);
633  for (long k = 0; k < m_nNZ; ++k) {
634  long globalCol = globalCols[k];
635  if (globalCol >= firstGlobalCol || globalCol < lastGlobalCol) {
636  utils::addToOrderedVector<long>(globalCol, ghostGlobalCols);
637  }
638  }
639  }
640 
641  return ghostGlobalCols;
642 }
643 #endif
644 
651 void SparseMatrix::addRow(const std::vector<long> &rowPattern, const std::vector<double> &rowValues)
652 {
653  addRow(rowPattern.size(), rowPattern.data(), rowValues.data());
654 }
655 
663 void SparseMatrix::addRow(long nRowNZ, const long *rowPattern, const double *rowValues)
664 {
665  if (countMissingRows() == 0) {
666  throw std::runtime_error("Unable to add another row: all rows have already been defined.");
667  }
668 
669  // Add the row pattern
670  m_pattern.pushBack(nRowNZ, rowPattern);
671 
672  // Add row values
673  m_values.insert(m_values.end(), rowValues, rowValues + nRowNZ);
674 
675  // Update the non-zero element counters
676  m_maxRowNZ = std::max(nRowNZ, m_maxRowNZ);
677  m_nNZ += nRowNZ;
678 
679  // Update the index of the last row
680  m_lastRow++;
681 }
682 
689 ConstProxyVector<long> SparseMatrix::getRowPattern(long row) const
690 {
691  ConstProxyVector<long> pattern;
692  getRowPattern(row, &pattern);
693 
694  return pattern;
695 }
696 
703 void SparseMatrix::getRowPattern(long row, ConstProxyVector<long> *pattern) const
704 {
705  const std::size_t *rowExtent = m_pattern.indices(row);
706 
707  const long *rowPattern = m_pattern.data() + rowExtent[0];
708  const std::size_t rowPatternSize = rowExtent[1] - rowExtent[0];
709 
710  pattern->set(rowPattern, rowPatternSize);
711 }
712 
719 ConstProxyVector<double> SparseMatrix::getRowValues(long row) const
720 {
721  ConstProxyVector<double> values;
722  getRowValues(row, &values);
723 
724  return values;
725 }
726 
733 void SparseMatrix::getRowValues(long row, ConstProxyVector<double> *values) const
734 {
735  const std::size_t *rowExtent = m_pattern.indices(row);
736 
737  const double *rowValues = m_values.data() + rowExtent[0];
738  const std::size_t nRowValues = rowExtent[1] - rowExtent[0];
739 
740  values->set(rowValues, nRowValues);
741 }
742 
743 }
